Investigation Files of the Rapp-Coudert Committee (New York State Legislature)
Investigation Files of the Rapp-Coudert Committee (New York State Legislature)

Brooklyn College: Includes List of Sponsors for Teachers Union, Lists of Brooklyn College students, Lists of Faculty; Reports Such as Personalities of Brooklyn College Faculty from Dies Committee, Overview of Educational Investigation, Day-by-Day History of BC as Reflected in the Files of the NY Times and Brooklyn Eagle, Preliminary Outline of Evidence Concerning Subversive Activities at Brooklyn Collegee and Many Other Related Items.
